fixes.name: Delta Down Fix FX T
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR UseCustom = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
VAR EndDateParam = SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As])
RETURN
IF(
    UseCustom,
    IF(
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Max Date Exclude] = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[EFFECTIVE_DATE],
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down Fix FX],
        0
    ),
    IF(
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[EFFECTIVE_DATE] = EndDateParam,
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down Fix FX],
        0
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the nested IF structure to DAX using VAR for parameter values. Replaced [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] with SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As]) and [Parameters].[End Date] with SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As]). All field references were transformed to 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[ColumnName].
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references Tableau parameters ([Parameters].[Use Custom Date] and [Parameters].[End Date]); per the rules, any parameter-based calculation must be created as a measure.
